51. а) $y=-|x^2-2x|=\begin{cases} 2x-x^2,\ x\leqslant0,\\ x^2-2x,\ 0<x<2,\\ 2x-x^2.\ x\geqslant2.\end{cases}$
$$$$% TIKZ_ID{9_klass_utf8-chapter006-051-solution-diag001.svg}
